value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Well, how did it go? Did you get any
good gift ideas?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|No, not really. There were some
good options, but unfortunately none
that I think Chrom would like...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|I see...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Ah, there you are Robin! I thought of
another gift for Chrom. How about
a training sword?$k$pYou know, something that he could
break over and over...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|Fear not! I now have an extremely
cool and utterly appropriate name
for a weapon to share!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|Ah, no... That's not exactly what...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_MM_Pair,Face|What are you all doing gathered
together here?$k$p$nMPID_ルフレ男|Whatever it is, it looks like fun. Do
you mind if we join you?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE13_05,0|$WmMPID_ルフレ男,ch04_00_Chrom_MM_Pair,Face|I see. So, you were on the hunt for a
special gift for Chrom...$k$p$nMPID_比翼クロム|Well, gift or not, you running away
from me was a bit of a shock.
Although I guess I misunderstood.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|I'm sorry, Father. I didn't mean for
that to happen but...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|She's been trying to figure out what
to get for you all morning. It's all
she's been able to think about!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_MM_Pair,Face|You have, Lucina? You don't have to
gift me anything. Just knowing you
care is more than enough for me.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Father, you have given me so much
that I can't put it all into words.$k$pSo...I wanted to give you something
in return. But I couldn't...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_MM_Pair,Face|Lucina... You have already given me
more than you could ever know.$k$pYou survived the future to come and
meet with me...$k$pTo have you here, before me now...
It makes me happier than I could
ever express.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Father... I hadn't really thought of it
that way. Spending time with those
you truly love is the best gift of all.$k$p$WmMPID_ルフレ男,ch04_00_Chrom_MM_Pair,Face|So, that settles it then? No more wild
gift hunt? Good. Now, let's go and
enjoy the festivities!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|If you don't mind...could I join you?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Yes, of course! Together, we'll make
this day one to remember forever!$k$p$Sbs150|
